entry.title: First Post on My Sweet New Blog
entry.content:
I am On My Way To Internet Fame and Fortune!

This is my first post on my new blog. While not super informative it should convey my sense of excitement and eagerness to engage with you, the reader!

entry.title: Setting up Pelican Site Generator
entry.summary:

“...so people will reach out to you instead of the other way around.”

Setup your own static website generator

  • blog on medium.com …
